name: The Mystery Of The Orphanage
description:
Welcome to a new edition of our saga The Mystery! This time we bring you The Mystery of the Orphanage!

It has been many years since you left the orphanage, but have never forgotten that some children disappeared there. One day you decide to take a trip to the orphanage to try to clarify the events that took place there.

Why did the children disappeared?

Are you ready for the truth?

Can you solve the mystery?

Try in this amazing Point and Click!


Features:

- Based on the Point and Click games
- Wonderful graphics that envelop you in history
- Lots of items to collect and puzzles to solve
- An incredible Soundtrack
- Auto-Saved
- HD Graphics
- All items tagged
- NO hidden objects
- Clue book
- Translated into: Spanish, English, Italian, French, German.
